## HttpHeadersInit interface

Headers to append to the request. Any headers that begin with `osd-` are considered private to Core and will cause [HttpHandler](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-public.httphandler.md) to throw an error.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface HttpHeadersInit 
```
